title: Typhoon Doksuri makes landfall in China afte deadly landslides in the Philippines
description: The storm ploughed into the eastern province of Fujian on Friday morning after heavy rains and gale-force winds in parts of Taiwan, especially the Penghu island group, also known as the Pescadores.
content:

en: Typhoon Doksuri makes landfall in China afte deadly landslides in the Philippines. The storm ploughed into the eastern province of Fujian on Friday morning after heavy rains and gale-force winds in parts of Taiwan, especially the Penghu island group, also known as the Pescadores.

title: Tropical Storm Calvin leaves Hawaii with only minor flooding, but hurricane season continues to loom
description: Hurricane season is still underway after Tropical Storm Calvin passed over Hawaii and left only minor flooding. Gov. Josh Green said the island still needs to prepare for future storms.

Gouverneur Josh Green sagte, die Insel müsse sich noch auf zukünftige Stürme vorbereiten.
en: Tropical Storm Calvin leaves Hawaii with only minor flooding, but hurricane season continues to loom. Hurricane season is still underway after Tropical Storm Calvin passed over Hawaii and left only minor flooding. Gov. Josh Green said the island still needs to prepare for future storms.
